  • Method Details

    • addIndex

      public boolean addIndex​(Index index) throws ExceedAUException, TimetableClashException, AlreadyRegisteredException
      Adds Index to the StudentRegisteredCourses
      Parameters:
      index - The Index to be added to the StudentRegisteredCourse
      Returns:
      Boolean that indicates false if the Student has been added to the waitlist of the Index
      Throws:
      ExceedAUException - If the user is unable to add the Index to the list of Registered Courses because it would exceed the AU limit
      TimetableClashException - If the user is unable to add the Index to the list of Registered Courses because of a Timetable Clash between te Index and the Student's exisiting Indexes
      AlreadyRegisteredException - If the user is unable to add the Index because he has already Registered for the Course

    • dropIndex

      public boolean dropIndex​(Index index)
      Drops Index from StudentRegisteredCourses
      Parameters:
      index - Index to be dropped from StudentRegisteredCourses
      Returns:
      boolean that indicates whether Index has been dropped from StudentRegisteredCourses and from the Index

    • moveToConfirmed

      public void moveToConfirmed​(Index index)
      Moves Index from waitlist to confirmed list in StudentRegisteredCourses
      Parameters:
      index - Index to be moved from waitlist to confirmed list

    • getConfirmedIndex

      public java.util.ArrayList<Index> getConfirmedIndex()
      Gets the confirmed list of Indexes that Student has registered for
      Returns:
      ArrayList of confirmed Indexes

    • getWaitlistedIndex

      public java.util.ArrayList<Index> getWaitlistedIndex()
      Gets the Indexes that the Student is waitlisted for
      Returns:
      ArrayList of confirmed Indexes

    • getRegisteredIndex

      public java.util.ArrayList<Index> getRegisteredIndex()
      Gets the merged list of Indexes from both the confirmed list and the waitlist
      Returns:
      ArrayList of all Indexes, both confirmed and on waitlist that the Student has registered for

    • changeIndex

      public boolean changeIndex​(Index oldIndex, Index newIndex) throws ExceedAUException, TimetableClashException, AlreadyRegisteredException
      Changes the Index of the Student from the current Index to a new Index of the same Course. This change is also reflected in the Indexes.
      Parameters:
      oldIndex - The current Index that Student has been registered for
      newIndex - Teh new Index that the Student will be changed to
      Returns:
      boolean that indicates true if the Student has been added to the confirmed list or false if the Student has been added to the waitlist
      Throws:
      ExceedAUException - If the user is unable to add the Index to the list of Registered Courses because it would exceed the AU limit
      TimetableClashException - If the user is unable to add the Index to the list of Registered Courses because of a Timetable Clash between te Index and the Student's exisiting Indexes
      AlreadyRegisteredException - If the user is unable to add the Index because he has already Registered for the Course

    • checkChangeIndex

      public boolean checkChangeIndex​(Index friendIndex, Index myIndex)
      Checks if there will be a clash in the timetable of the student if the Current Index of a Course is swopped with Index of another Student taking the same Course
      Parameters:
      friendIndex - The Index of the other Student
      myIndex - The Index of the current Student
      Returns:
      boolean that indicates whether there is a Timetable clash

    • swopPlaces

      public boolean swopPlaces​(Index friendIndex, Student friend) throws TimetableClashException, AlreadyRegisteredException
      Swops the Index of the Student with the Index of another Student taking the same Course. This will be reflected in the other Student as well.
      Parameters:
      friendIndex - The Index of the other Student
      friend - The other Student
      Returns:
      boolean that indicates true if the current Student has been swopped to the Confirmed list of the other person's Index or false if the Waitlist of the other person's Index
      Throws:
      TimetableClashException
      AlreadyRegisteredException

    • sendNotification

      public void sendNotification​(Index index)
      Sends Notification to Student's Email to inform them of the fact that they have been moved from the waitlist of an Index to the confrimed list of the Index. This occurs when another Student is removed from the confirmed list of the same Index that the current Student is being waitlisted for
      Parameters:
      index - The index that in which the Student has been moved from the waitllist to the confirmed list
